item.title: How to Create a Node App Within a Docker Container
item.description: Setup Requirements Before you go through this fun tutorial ensure: * You at least have an understanding of javascript and terminal commands. * You should know what Docker is and in theory how it works. * You have should node and npm installed on your computer. You can do this by typing this in your terminal. $ node --version && node --version Also, since we talking containers well you need docker installed.
